title: International War Criminal
text:
International War Criminal is an EP by "<a href="The%20Slackers">The Slackers</a>" first released in 2004. The five-song single, released by Thought Squad, continues the band's turn to more politically themed lyrics first heard on their 2003 release, "<a href="Close%20My%20Eyes%20%28album%29">Close My Eyes</a>."
The EP features a full-band version of the song "International War Criminal" which first appeared on <a href="Vic%20Ruggiero">Vic Ruggiero</a>'s second solo album, "<a href="Alive%20at%20the%20Ladybug%20House">Alive at the Ladybug House</a>". A dub version of "Propaganda" also appears on "<a href="The%20Slackers/Pulley%20Split">The Slackers/Pulley Split</a>" and "<a href="An%20Afternoon%20in%20Dub">An Afternoon in Dub</a>". All five songs also appear on "<a href="Peculiar%20%28album%29">Peculiar</a>", although all except "Rider" are re-recorded.
